snippet: Minnesota Timberwolves swingman Chase Budinger will miss the next three to four months while recovering from surgery to repair a torn lateral meniscus in his left knee.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota Timberwolves swingman Chase Budinger will miss the next three to four months while recovering from surgery to repair a torn lateral meniscus in his left knee.

headline.seo: Timberwolves Swingman Budinger to Miss 3 or 4 Months
headline.main: Timberwolves Swingman Budinger to Miss 3 or 4 Months
